description: This is an inferno grenade, designed to channel Netherum energy to increase its incendiary power.  Once you throw it, you will have five seconds to get away before it explodes into a raging firestorm.

use_action.msg: You pull the pin on the grenade.

description: This is an active inferno grenade.  Better throw it!

This is a post-apocalyptic recreation of an inferno grenade, less powerful than a lab-made one but still very dangerous.  Once you throw it, you will have five seconds to get away before it explodes into a raging firestorm.

use_action.msg: You pull the pin on the grenade.

description: This is an active makeshift inferno grenade.  Better throw it!

A strange grenade, designed like nothing you've seen before.  It's round, with flat black crystalline panels like television screens on four sides, and two buttons on either end.  On both of the buttons is a large Ψ, surrounded by a circle with a line through it.

use_action.msg: You press the buttons on the sides of the null grenade.

description: This null grenade is activate and ready to unleash its pulse.  You'd better throw it!

use_action.message: The %s is already active, try throwing it instead.
use_action.name: Push buttons

description: A strange grenade, designed like nothing you've seen before.  It's round, with flat black crystalline panels like television screens on four sides, and two buttons on either end.  On both of the buttons is a large Ψ, surrounded by a circle with a line through it.  The buttons on either end are depressed.

A matrix crystal attuned to pyrokinesis.  This one has a (currently) stable loop of energy set up within it.  It would take only a thought to destabilize the energy loop and set up a reaction that would lead to a massive explosion.

use_action.msg: With a thought, you destabilize the matrix crystal.

description: A matrix crystal attuned to pyrokinesis.  The faint light in its depths is growing brighter and brighter, and the crystal itself is heating up as you hold it.

use_action.message: The %s is already destabilized, try throwing it instead.
use_action.name: Push buttons

description: The LV429 fires a series of extremely short high-energy laser pulses, more like bullets than a traditional laser beam, greatly reducing dwell time and increasing weapon effectiveness.  Matrix crystal technology has made the weapon compact enough to be man-portable and provided it with enough power for essentially unlimited combat operations, but heat dissipation is still a problem, preventing it from being fired more than once every few seconds.
//: Recharge time is 8 seconds due to bug #48019, making it actually 4 seconds. Reduce to 4 seconds if that ever gets fixed.
